title: Seif Body Text
content:
Hi,

This is from a brochure for the “The Independent Type: Books and Writing in Victoria”.  
I have used various methods to try and id this font, can’t seem to get anywhere..

Was wondering if anyone could id this?

Much appreciated,  
Wei

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924022015im_/http:/typophile.com/files/16327971_6460.jpg)
author: ppk812

comments.content:
Ah yes i think it is!

thanks
